Fei joined the Oldham lab in October 2023. He studies the metabolic pathways that contribute to myofibroblast differentiation and extracellular matrix production in experimental models of pulmonary fibrosis.

Research fellow in Pharmacology | 2021-2023<br>

BA in Clinical Medicine | 2014
